Uses of Package
com.adobe.xmp.options

Packages that use com.adobe.xmp.options
com.adobe.xmp Package containing the xmpcore interface. 
com.adobe.xmp.options Package containing the option classes. 
com.adobe.xmp.properties Package containing the property information classes. 
 

Classes in com.adobe.xmp.options used by com.adobe.xmp
AliasOptions
          Options for XMPSchemaRegistry.registerAlias( String, String, String, String, AliasOptions).
IteratorOptions
          Options for XMPIterator construction.
ParseOptions
          Options for XMPMetaFactory.parse(InputStream, ParseOptions).
PropertyOptions
          The property flags are used when properties are fetched from the XMPMeta-object and provide more detailed information about the property.
SerializeOptions
          Options for XMPMetaFactory.serializeToBuffer(XMPMeta, SerializeOptions).
